document.masterDocTitle: A review of East and Central African species of Letheobia Cope, revived from the synonymy of Rhinotyphlops Fitzinger, with descriptions of five new species (Serpentes: Typhlopidae)

, Rev. Zool. Bot. Afr. 23 : 189 & Ann. Mus. Roy. Congo Belge , Zool. ( 1 ) 3 : 82 ,
Figs. 1–3
. Type locality: Lukafu, Haut-Katanga, Congo Belge [= Democratic Republic of Congo ] (

,
27 ° 32 ’E
, elevation 1115 m ), holotype MRAC 7251 ;

,
28 ° 40 ’E
, elevation 1200 m ), holotype MRAC 7375 .

subSubSection.paragraph: Size. Largest specimen (NMZB-UM 2542 — Chilongowelo, Zambia ) 540 mm in total length.

Localities. DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO . Kaswabilenga IRSNB 2203 ; Lukafu
